name: @dnaroid/mcp-code-indexer
description: Local code indexer and MCP server for AI agents
author: Dnaroid

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p build/lib/utils/grammars && cp lib/utils/grammars/*.wasm build/lib/utils/grammars/ && cp lib/cli/mcp-proxy-template.js build/lib/cli/
scripts.test: npm run build && node --test build/lib/core/indexer-core.test.js build/lib/core/project-detector.test.js build/lib/mcp/mcp-tools.test.js build/lib/utils/snapshot-manager.test.js build/tests/find_usages_e2e.test.js build/tests/indexer_changes.test.js build/tests/live_search.test.js build/tests/tools_handlers.test.js build/tests/tools_real_execution.test.js build/tests/daemon_proxy_integration.test.js
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
